casebody.data:
No. 660,

Misc.

Jones v. Cunningham, Penitentiary Superintendent. F. D. G. Ribble and Daniel J. Meador for petitioner. Reno S. Harp III, Assistant Attorney General of Virginia, for respondent. Lawrence Speiser filed a brief for the American Civil Liberties Union, as amicus curiae, in support of the petition.

Motion for leave to proceed in forma pauperis granted. Petition for writ of certiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the Fourth Circuit granted limited to the question of “mootness.” Case transferred to the appellate docket.
